notes: Dominant in Aberdare, Mt Kenya, Mau and Cherangani forests
source: KEFRI indigenous species guide; GBM restoration manuals

notes: High-elevation montane tree; common in Mau, Aberdare

notes: Widespread across Mt Kenya, Aberdare, Cherangani

notes: High-value medicinal tree in Mt Kenya, Mau, Cherangani

notes: Lower montane relative of Podocarpus; appears in dry forests

notes: Upper montane species around Aberdares and Mt Kenya

notes: Widespread mid-elevation Afro-montane species; Mau & Mt Elgon

notes: Fast-growing agroforestry species; present around water tower edges

notes: Moist forest species in Mau, Cherangani, and Aberdare

notes: Dominant bamboo zone species in Aberdare and Mt Kenya
